28b5ab26-4234-4ce6-b345-e81fe2ff2ab3.name: 仆从
28b5ab26-4234-4ce6-b345-e81fe2ff2ab3.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

d05a2649-c6f1-4d05-bfe1-f5fe0b3fcf4c.name: 感同身受
d05a2649-c6f1-4d05-bfe1-f5fe0b3fcf4c.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

07082c97-2e1d-4cc2-91be-f0ceef069df0.name: 感同身受
07082c97-2e1d-4cc2-91be-f0ceef069df0.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

d964b8b9-309d-4a51-8e41-14a02dd64f09.name: 感同身受
d964b8b9-309d-4a51-8e41-14a02dd64f09.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

5c435701-502a-4463-85ce-2c12a8bb8d8d.name: 感同身受
5c435701-502a-4463-85ce-2c12a8bb8d8d.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

b569fb8e-8d84-4b5e-873a-cee8e8743acd.name: 特化
b569fb8e-8d84-4b5e-873a-cee8e8743acd.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

be074429-d3b6-4cdd-a5cf-6f7391944841.name: 特化
be074429-d3b6-4cdd-a5cf-6f7391944841.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

d1b6d1eb-1b7f-46ff-a8c0-d1c5666e188f.name: 特化
d1b6d1eb-1b7f-46ff-a8c0-d1c5666e188f.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

01e15e6d-a82a-4f84-a756-5778b2d3f65f.name: 战斗反射
01e15e6d-a82a-4f84-a756-5778b2d3f65f.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

1d13fef5-23f1-455c-92b2-652fe0755afe.name: 健康
1d13fef5-23f1-455c-92b2-652fe0755afe.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

71568d1b-88d7-4e9e-ae8a-7ecb99de7584.name: Fit, Very
71568d1b-88d7-4e9e-ae8a-7ecb99de7584.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

438da16c-e4b9-416a-9bda-c54586d147cb.name: 幸运
438da16c-e4b9-416a-9bda-c54586d147cb.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

2ed248e6-e239-4136-900a-286e39aca8fe.name: Luck, Extraordinary
2ed248e6-e239-4136-900a-286e39aca8fe.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

d81beb23-c493-40e5-9951-5602d561145a.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

cb7de0d2-e5e7-417e-83ad-ed5782204c3b.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

5dbd22c2-7147-4678-8043-696c68c6c869.name: 高痛阈
5dbd22c2-7147-4678-8043-696c68c6c869.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

c2421b64-69cf-416d-b8f9-81e64618e35b.name: 执念
c2421b64-69cf-416d-b8f9-81e64618e35b.notes: Slay some specific type of monster

7bccd3a5-066b-4def-9cab-6bfefda997c4.name: 执念
7bccd3a5-066b-4def-9cab-6bfefda997c4.notes: Become a master of my weapon

0736d431-95a4-4739-beee-16760cef507a.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
0736d431-95a4-4739-beee-16760cef507a.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group
